entities.name: madam pomfrey

entities.name: cornelius fudge

entities.name: snape

entities.name: ron

entities.name: black

relationships.description: Harry and Madam Pomfrey are talking to each other about Harry's condition.
Harry is concerned about Ron's injury and asks Madam Pomfrey how he is doing.
Madam Pomfrey is taking care of Harry and Ron in the hospital wing.
Cornelius Fudge and Snape are together in the corridor outside Harry's room.
Harry is concerned about Black being locked away upstairs.
